sentences.sentence: Saturday's mutiny attempt while Wagner chief Bogotan reportedly lands in Belarus. Slowly but surely Ukraine claims to be making gains in the trenches of Bakhmut but Russia says it has inflicted heavy losses on Kyiv's forces.

sentences.sentence: MEPs reject the EU so-called nature restoration law after weeks of bitter dispute.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Former Audi and Volkswagen executive Rupert Stadler pleads guilty to fraud charges over the Dieselgate scandal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He's been given a 21-month suspended sentence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin has held a solemn ceremony honouring Russia's armed forces for preventing civil war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With the country coming to terms with the uprising by the Wagner mercenary group, the Russian president has raised his profile in recent days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He led a silent tribute to a number of military pilots whose planes were shot down during the revolt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Separately, Russia's Defense Ministry has posted messages on its Telegram channel saying Wagner was preparing to hand over its heavy weaponry to the country's regular armed forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The news came as Wagner chief Yevgeny Prigozhin apparently left Russia and arrived in Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A website tracking his plane showed it flying into Minsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko, who reportedly brokered the deal that exiles Prigozhin to his country, made no reference to the Wagner leader in a speech on the weekend's events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Prigozhin's long-term fate remains unclear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russian authorities have belatedly announced they are dropping mutiny charges against him and other Wagner members.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The uprising erupted after long-simmering tensions with Moscow's military establishment came to a head over moves to integrate mercenary groups into the army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Dramatic helmet cam footage appears to show a gun battle in trenches near Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The 3rd Brigade of the Ukrainian Army released a video said to show members of the brigade staging an assault on the 57th Motorized Rifle Brigade of the Russian army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Over the past few days, Ukraine has claimed to be making progress in the area near Bakhmut, but the gains are slow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia has not officially acknowledged Ukrainian advances and says it has inflicted heavy losses on Kyiv's forces in the previous 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has taken time to hand out medals to soldiers in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On his return, he also stopped off at a gas station and posed for selfies with locals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Moscow says two of its fighter jets intercepted a British Royal Air Force reconnaissance plane and two Typhoon fighters when they entered Russian airspace over the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They were escorted out of the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: sea. They were escorted out of the area. MEPs in the European Parliament's Environment Committee celebrate their victory on Tuesday after lawmakers, mainly from the right, voted down the EU's so-called nature restoration law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Shame. Shame. Shame.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Shame. Shame. It's the first time that the committee has rejected legislation from the European Green Deal, which aims to make the continent much more climate friendly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The rejection comes after the biggest political bloc in the parliament, the centre-right EPP group, launched an attack against the law, citing fears that the agricultural sector will be negatively impacted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The baseline of the proposal was not good made. It's a very, very bad proposal. We don't know what happens in the different member states with this proposal. We have no clear impact assessment to food security. And so the basic is not very good and so we said we need a good baseline to have a good proposal for nature restoration and I'm very sad that we have to go to this point and vice president Timmermans doesn't realize in the last nine months that he made a bad proposal took it back and make a better one I'm very sad about this the aim of the proposal is to restore habitats and species that have been degraded by human interference and climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Farmers across the E.U. fear that the plan will force them to give up production on some of their land to make way for forests, meadows and ditches.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But supporters of the plan say this vision is short-sighted and endangers the E.U.'s Green Deal, which aims to reach climate neutrality by 2050.

We will not reach our targets for sustainable agriculture. And we will also not reach our climate targets because we need about 10% of the emission reduction which is enshrined in the climate law is supposed to come from ecosystems which absorb carbon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If we do not protect them, if we do not strengthen them by restoring them, we will not reach our climate targets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

Deforestation also is causing an immediate temperature increase in nearby areas that has the effect of doubling the increased temperatures caused by greenhouse warming alone.

sentences.sentence: A former top executive at Audi has been given a 21-month suspended sentence after pleading guilty to fraud charges over the carmaker's emissions scandal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The court in Munich also fined Rupert Stadler more than a million euros and ordered him to pay legal costs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Two other co-defendants were given shorter suspended sentences and lesser fines. Er hat mehr als 1 Million Euro gekostet und ihn zu legalen Kosten bezahlt. Zwei andere Kodefendanten wurden kürzer aufgespalten und weniger Fälle.

sentences.sentence: Israel's far-right government has approved plans to build thousands of new homes in illegal Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: More than 5,000 units are at various stages of planning and it is not immediately clear when construction would begin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: settlement policy. Muslims taking part in the annual Hajj pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia began a day of prayer and meditation on Mount Arafat near Mecca on Tuesday. It's the second day of Hajj and regarded as the most important stage. At dawn, many faithful flocked to the religious site where the Prophet Muhammad is said to have delivered his last sermon. Pilgrims spent the night in Mina, a valley surrounded by rocky mountains seven kilometers from the great mosque of Mecca.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The day will be spent praying and reciting the Quran under a hot sun before sleeping in the open air at Muzdalifah, halfway between Mina and Mount Arafat. Afterwards they collect pebbles in Muzdalifah to be used in the open air at Muzdalifah, halfway between Mina and Mount Arafat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Afterwards, they collect pebbles in Muzdalifah to be used in the symbolic stoning of pillars representing the devil back in Mina.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
